shadow.name: SELF-OBSESSION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Treading, expressing through self-obsession

gift.name: NATURALNESS
gift.description: The gift frequency of Treading, expressing through naturalness

siddhi.name: BEING
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Treading, expressing through being

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 10 shadow frequency. The self-obsession you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural naturalness. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from self-obsession to naturalness.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your g center. Notice the sensation of self-obsession.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 10 consciously for 7 days, the self-obsession pattern will shift toward naturalness.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 10 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from self-obsession toward naturalness
